title: Infinity Wallet futuristic/neon theme + refreshed branding assets

requirements.summary: Refresh the app-wide visual theme to a futuristic, digitally appealing neon style inspired by the uploaded Infinity Coin logo, applying consistently across layout and all existing pages without modifying ui components.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme tokens in frontend/index.css are updated to reflect a futuristic/digital style inspired by image.png (e.g., dark/space-like surfaces, neon accents, high-contrast text), while keeping UI readable and accessible.
AppLayout header/navigation/footer and all page headers/cards/forms visually match the updated theme (consistent background, borders, radii, shadows/glows, and hover/focus states).
No changes are made to any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them via props/classes only).

file_operations.description: Update OKLCH theme tokens (background/surfaces/border/ring/primary/accent/muted/chart) to a dark space-like base with neon cyan/purple accents inspired by image.png; add a small set of reusable base styles (e.g., subtle starfield/gradient background on body and consistent focus-ring/glow defaults) while keeping contrast accessible.
Mirror the updated futuristic/digital theme tokens from frontend/src/index.css to ensure any build/runtime path that relies on this file remains visually consistent.

Extend Tailwind theme utilities to support the new futuristic look (e.g., additional boxShadow presets for neon glow, optional backgroundImage gradients) while continuing to map colors to existing CSS variables.

Adjust layout container/header/nav/footer classes to match the new theme (e.g., gradient/blur surfaces, consistent border opacity, neon-accent hover/focus states) using className composition only; do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Tune the signed-in principal pill styling (border/background/text) to match the new futuristic surface treatment using className changes only (no ui component edits).
Apply consistent page header styling and card accents (e.g., neon highlight, improved icon container glow) via className adjustments only to align with the new theme.
Align Send page headers/cards/forms/alerts with the updated theme (consistent surfaces, borders, focus/glow accents) through className changes only; keep existing flow unchanged.
Align Contacts page header, list cards, and dialogs trigger buttons with the new futuristic theme using className adjustments only; preserve current behaviors and do not modify ui component sources.
Align History page header, tabs area, transaction cards, and badges with the updated theme through className adjustments only to ensure consistent visuals across screens.

acceptanceCriteria: The app header logo (used by frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLogo.tsx) renders the updated infinity-wallet-logo.dim_1024x1024.png without layout breakage.
The Infinity Coin token icon (used on the Dashboard balance card) renders the updated infinity-coin-icon.dim_512x512.png and matches the futuristic/neon style.
All images are served as static frontend assets (no backend image serving).
